alert.note: Alert for Lee; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Ogle and western Lee Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 217 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms producing funnel clouds along a line extending from near Forreston to near Walnut. Movement was north to northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Brief, thin funnel clouds SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible if one of the funnel clouds briefly touches down. Locations impacted include... Dixon, Oregon, Mount Morris, Amboy, Polo, Forreston, Lost Nation, Leaf River, Grand Detour, Nelson, Harmon, Woodland Shores, Adeline, Eldena, Baileyville, Woosung and Nachusa. Including the following interstate... I-88 between mile markers 45 and 61. This includes... Castle Rock State Park, Ogle County Fairgrounds, Sauk Valley College, and White Pines State Park. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
